title: An Act relating to embodied carbon emission reductions in state-funded projects

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Garballey of Arlington, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3337) of Sean Garballey that the Division of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance implement embodied carbon emission reductions in state-funded projects.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/15/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on House Ways and Means
the committee on House Ways and Means
